name: Missile City Defender 2D
description: Build, develop and defend your city from waves of non-stop attack in this fiendishly addictive game inspired by the arcade classic, Missile Command. As your city's population grows, you increase your income to build troops both on the ground, and in the air, all while blasting away at wave after wave of incoming missiles! Survive as long as you can through endless waves of increasing difficulty.
